name: The Hammer Games
description:
Entry for VR JAM 2020

Tested build on Valvue Index, but should also work on Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest (with Link Cable), and HTC Vive.

**Controls**

  • Right Trigger to Re-Center your play area.
  • Swing Hammer to do the hammering.

Wasn't able to complete the third minigame in time (the eggs). Might continue working on this afterwards. I would love to add sound effects and music as well as more minigames. Plus fix all the bugs while I'm at it!

Used #Clayxels for almsot all of the models in the game.

Big thanks to Valem and Andrew for their incredibly valuable tutorials on the new Unity XR Toolkit which made this project very easy to setup for multiple devices at once.
